tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PatientData (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR,
    treatment_date DATE,
    treatment_outcome VARCHAR,
    hospital_id INT,
    performance_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
    patient_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_date DATE,
    treatment_description TEXT,
    treatment_outcome VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  patient_age INT,
  admission_date DATE,
  discharge_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(255),
  treatment_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  treatment_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender CHAR(1),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
    treatment_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis_id INT,
    treatment_date DATE,
    treatment_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
age INT,
gender VARCHAR(10),
admittance_date DATE,
discharge_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
patient_id INT,
treatment_date DATE,
treatment_name VARCHAR(100),
treatment_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
treatment_outcome VARCHAR(50),
FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(id));

CREATE TABLE Hospitals (hospital_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
hospital_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
location VARCHAR(100),
ratings FLOAT,
num_of_beds INT);

CREATE TABLE Admissions (admission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
patient_id INT,
hospital_id INT,
admission_date DATE,
admission_type VARCHAR(50),
admission_reason TEXT,
FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(id),
FOREIGN KEY (hospital_id) REFERENCES Hospitals(hospital_id));

CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
hospital_id INT,
metric_name VARCHAR(100),
metric_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
metric_date DATE,
FOREIGN KEY (hospital_id) REFERENCES Hospitals(hospital_id));
